## Map Visualization

Below you can view a walkthrough of an interactive county census analysis that I did in R.

[HOME](https://sophieholtzman.github.io/mywebsite/index.html)

{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(tigris)
library(sf)
library(tidycensus)
library(htmltools)
library(janitor)
library(here)
library(mapview)
library(leafsync)
